name: py-coapthon3
description:
CoAPthon3 is a porting to python3 of my CoAPthon library. CoAPthon3 is a
python3 library to the CoAP protocol compliant with the RFC. Branch is
available for the Twisted framework.

dependencies.name: py-cachetools
dependencies.description:
This module provides various memoizing collections and decorators,
including variants of the Python 3 Standard Library @lru_cache function
decorator.
